Summary: AT LEAST 5 TO 10 MILES OUT WHILE SWIMMING IN A COMMUNITY POOL MANY OF US THE SWIMMMERS WATCHED AS OBJECT DIDNT MOVE FOR OVERAN HOUR MY SON AND MYSELF SEEMED TOO BE THE ONLY ONES TO CARE.
divs: Sighting DetailsWE WHERE SWIMMING IN OR COM.POOL MANY PEOPLE WHERE THERE AND SEEN BUT MOST LOST INTEREST THEY WHERE KIDS COUNTRY CLUB IN GLEN BURNIE MD.21060.THIS WAS THE SECOND TIME I SAW AN OBJECT NOT KNOWN TO ME AS A TEENAGER MYSELF AND A FRIEND SAW 3 FIRE BALLS IN A TRIANGLER SHAPE HOOVERING OVER THE CREEK AS SOON AS WE POINTED THEM OUT THEY TOOK OFF SILENT WITH NO SOUND STRAIGHT IN TOO OUTESPACE.I DONT KNOW WHAT THESE CRAFTS WHERE BUT IVE WORKED WITH AIRPLANES MY WHOLE LIFE AND THESE WHERE NOT AIRPLANES.I VE TOLD THESE STORYS TO FRIENDS BY WORD OF MOUTH AN WAS JOKED AT BUT I KNOW WHAT I SAW AN SO DO THE OTHERE PEOLE THERE,I TOLD BILL BEAN A UFOMAN BUT HE ONLY CARES TO TELL HIS STORYS I DONT WONT MONEY OR ANY GAIN FROM THIS IT JUST A RARE WONDERFULL THING TO SEE GOD BLESS.P.S. REMMBER THIS HAPPENED YEARS AGO ITS JUST NOW I FOUND THIS INTERNET SITE GOOOD LUCK KG
